item.title: Reading
item.description:
At the beginning of 2021, I set myself the goal of reading one book a week (inspired by this video).

And since then, with a few exceptions, I’ve stuck to it. This year I relaxed the rules a bit and allowed myself more time for books and sometimes put books aside again if they weren’t the right ones, but I (always) loved to read and still read quite a lot.

That’s why I’m sharing my reading lists of the last few years here, and maybe the odd book review in the future if I feel like it.

I read books sometimes in German, sometimes in English, sometimes on paper, often on my reader (a Tolino), and sometimes I relax and listen to an audio book. Whatever I feel like.

Books I read in 2023
August
  • Margaret Atwood: The Handmaids Tale
  • Steve Wozniak: iWoz
  • Natalie Goldberg: Writing down the Bones
Juli
  • Sabine Dardenne: Ihm in die Augen sehen
  • Joe Haldeman: Forever Free
  • Veit Etzold: Dark Web
Juni
  • Arthur C. Clarke: Rendezvous mit Rama
  • Greg McKeown: Multipliers
  • Greg McKeown: Essentialism
  • Greg McKeown: Effortless
Mai
  • Joe Haldeman: The Forever War
  • Tom Hillebrandt: Drohnenland
  • Max Brooks: Devolution
April
  • J.K. Rowling: Harry Potter und der Gefangene von Askaban [Hörbuch]
  • J.K. Rowling: Harry Potter und der Orden des Phoenix [Hörbuch]
  • J.K. Rowling: Harry Potter und der Halbblutprinz [Hörbuch]
  • J.K. Rowling: Harry Potter und die Heiligtümer des Todes [Hörbuch]
  • Prince Harry: Spare
März
  • Ryan Holiday: Conspiracy: Peter Thiel, Hulk Hogan, Gawker, and the Anatomy of Intrigue
  • Daniel Suarez: Kill Decision

  • Christopher Browning: Ordinary Men
  • J.K. Rowling: Harry Potter und der Stein der Weisen [Hörbuch]
  • J.K. Rowling: Harry Potter und die Kammer des Schreckens [Hörbuch]
  • C.S.Lewis: Das Wunder von Narnia
  • J.K. Rowling: Harry Potter und der Feuerkelch [Hörbuch]
Februar
  • Blake Crouch: Recursion
  • Katy Milkman: How to change
  • Stanislaw Lem: Solaris [Hörbuch]
  • Blake Crouch: Dark Matter
Januar
  • Terry Pratchett, Stephen Baxter: Das Lange Utopia [Hörbuch]
  • Terry Pratchett, Stephen Baxter: Der Lange Kosmos [Hörbuch]
  • Logan Ury: How to not die alone
  • Oliver Sax: Awakenings

Books I want to read
  • Stephen Baxter: Nasa-Trilogie (Ares, Titan, Moonseed)

If you have any recommendations for books I might enjoy, please send them my way!
